Name: CRUEL GHOST GLAIVE OF PROPOGATION
Text: CRUEL GHOST GLAIVE OF PROPOGATION|THROW DAMAGE: 180 TO 508|ONE-HAND DAMAGE: 112 TO 360|QUANTITY: 106 OF 120|REQUIRED DEXTERITY: 127|REQUIRED STRENGTH: 79|REQUIRED LEVEL: 59|JAVELIN CLASS - NORMAL ATTACK SPEED|INDESTRUCTIBLE|+300% ENHANCED DAMAGE|REPLENISHES QUANTITY|ETHEREAL (CANNOT BE REPAIRED)|CTRL + LEFT CLICK TO DROP
